Reviews.Title: Horrible Seller - outlet not compatible in the US
Reviews.Author: sg95
Reviews.Content: I basically blew out my fuse because this camera comes with an outlet for 250 volts and an adapter.  Well the voltage in the US is 120 NOT 250! This is so stupid. Horrible seller because this information is not at all indicated in the discription of the item, even SOny doesnt know how this happened.  Why would you ship such an item to the US????

Reviews.Title: Just LOVE this camera!
Reviews.Author: Sabrina Sierra Morales
Reviews.Content: Makes perfect pictures even in low light! At night, at the club, in the sun, just love it!I dropped mine and it broke. I ordered the same again cause I never want another camera anymore!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Especially for Video
Reviews.Author: Product User "Dan"
Reviews.Content: Amazing performance. Make sure to buy more batteries, which are charged outside the camera. The camera works well and the color is fine (or even cool).

ProductInfo.Features:
12.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor for stunning low-light performance & bright F2.4 lens
2.8 Clear Photo LCD Plus
24mm (35mm equiv) professional wide angle G Lens
1080i AVCHD Movie records high-quality HD movies
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-WX5 Purple WX Series, 3D Sweep Panorama, Exmor R CMOS Sensor
